EmailTemplate.name: Testing on24 lead.z.Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] {{my.Event Name:default=edit me}} - {{my.Event Date:default=edit me}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You're now registered for Honeywell Aerospace's upcoming webinar. Here are the details you'll need:
Webinar Title: {{my.Event Name:default=edit me}} <[[{{member.webinar url}}]]>
Date: {{my.Event Date:default=edit me}} {{my.Add to Calendar:default=edit me}}
(If this webinar requires any technical instructions, please list here.)
Please contact us at add the email address of the point person with any questions.
We look forward to seeing you!
Sincerely,
{{my.Event Manager:default=edit me}}
